modName: BCF - Wrye BAIN conversions for various mods
summary: Allows you to install mods with Wrye Bash that are not BAIN-friendly.
descriptionHtml:
--- How to install a mod with BAIN ---

Just drag\'n\'drop the archive into the installers tab, and select move.

However, for some mods the archive is listed grey, because BAIN is not able to detect how this file has to be installed. Other mods contain optional files that BAIN cannot find. In this case you need a BCF; you can download some of them here.

--- How to install a BCF ---

In the installers tab, right-click the table header and select \"Open...\". It will open the folder where all the mod archives are. The BCF belongs into the \"Bain Converters\" subfolder.

Notice that you still need the original mod, the BCF does not contain any files except the conversion data.

--- Install a mod with a BCF ---

Right-click the mod, select Conversions -> Apply -> <The Conversion>.
BAIN will create a converted mod, which you can install then.

--- Currently supported ---

Phygit\'s FemFeet 2.2 http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666
* fixed archives structures

aknot\'s CBBE feet nail colors http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3685
* color selection

SkyUI [url=\"http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863\"]SkyUI[/url]
* icon set selection

If you need another one, just drop me a comment.
author: derari
